channel.title: Social Data Analysis Final Project
channel.description: Recent content on Social Data Analysis Final Project

item.title: Al-Shabaab
item.description: In order to learn more about the conflicts we decided to make use of the short summary of each of the events that stores the most important details surrounding the event that can give us more context. To analyse it, we preprocessed the text data and created word clouds to discover the main themes in the context of each conflict type. There are a couple of interesting things to see here.

item.title: African Conflicts
item.description: Analysis and visualisation of Conflict Data for Africa 1997 - 2016.
